articles.title: Woman jailed over £39 donation to Ukraine freed in US-Russia prisoner swap - BBC
articles.description: Russian-American Ksenia Karelina was released by Moscow in return for the freeing of Russian-German Arthur Petrov.
articles.content:
A Russian-American citizen has been released in a prisoner swap between Moscow and Washington. 
Amateur ballerina Ksenia Karelina, a Los Angeles resident, had been in prison in Russia for over a yea… [+1189 chars]
